frontmatter.title: Ionic2 - Hammer JS Example
frontmatter.excerpt: Gesture event support is also one of the reason behind popularity of mobile applications. Capturing gesture events can be easily done in case of native mobile applications, since all the mobile platform expose gesture events in native code.

frontmatter.title: Ionic2/Cordova - Android splash screen and icon is not working
frontmatter.excerpt: An attractive icon and splash screen are always important for your   mobileapplication. after all they are the first thing anyone will look into.
